mapper.insert: insert into hz_vm (vm_id, vm_name, template_id, `state`, ip_address, vm_create_time, last_update_time, `type`, network_id, is_delete) values (#{vmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vmCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{networkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update hz_vm set vm_name = #{vmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, template_id = #{templateId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `state` = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip_address = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vm_create_time = #{vmCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, network_id = #{networkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=INTEGER} where vm_id = #{vmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select vm_id, vm_name, template_id, `state`, ip_address, vm_create_time, last_update_time, `type`, network_id, is_delete from hz_vm where vm_id = #{vmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select vm_id, vm_name, template_id, `state`, ip_address, vm_create_time, last_update_time, `type`, network_id, is_delete from hz_vm
